vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
FindThisHash.solve (patch_1.sol#9-12) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(1000000000000000000000) (patch_1.sol#11)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.0 (patch_1.sol#1): it allows old versions

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
